sqlMap.select: select num, couplename, usePoint, getPoint, place, regdate, r from (select num, couplename, usePoint, getPoint, place, regdate, rownum r from (select num, couplename, usePoint, getPoint, place, regdate from dc_point)) where r>=#startRow# and r<=#endRow# order by num desc
select count(*) from event order by enumber desc

select enumber, ename, eimg, sdate, edate, wcouples, regdate, wnumber, w, r from (select enumber, ename, eimg, sdate, edate, wcouples, regdate, wnumber, w, rownum r from (select enumber, ename, eimg, sdate, edate, wcouples, regdate, wnumber, w from event ) order by enumber desc) where r>=#startRow# and r<=#endRow#
select * from event order by enumber desc
select * from event where w=#way# order by enumber desc
select * from event where ename like '%'||#keyword#||'%' and w=#way# order by enumber desc
select * from event where ename like '%'||#keyword#||'%' order by enumber desc
select * from dc_point where couplename like '%'||#couplename#||'%' and place = #place#
select count(*) from dc_point where couplename like '%'||#couplename#||'%' and place = #place#
select * from event where wcouples like '%'||#keyword#||'%' and w=#way# order by enumber desc
select * from event where wcouples like '%'||#keyword#||'%' order by enumber desc
select * from event order by enumber desc
select * from event where w = #w# order by enumber desc
select count(*) from event where w = #w# order by enumber desc
